name: Svnup-haskell
body:
# svnup-haskell

This is an archive of a little test code I wrote, to learn [Haskell](http://www.haskell.org/).

I [blogged about it years ago](http://web.archive.org/web/20080101024229/www.almostserio.us/pages/svnup-haskell), but that blog has been taken down. This archive is to preserve that code.

It's quite simple. Given a folder, this will loop through all direct child folders and will pull updates if a child folder is a [Subversion](http://subversion.tigris.org/) working copy.
tagline: A small utility that updates all Subversion working copies under a given folder.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
